text: Avana horatu nivu yarannu pujisuttiruviro avarella nivu mattu nim'ma purvajaru ittukonda kevala kelavu hesarugalu matra. Avugala paravagi allahanu yavude puraveyannu ilisilla. Adhikaravu allahanige matra seride. Tanna horatu bere yarannu pujisabaradu endu avanu adesisiddane. Iduve sthiravada dharma â€“ adare manavaralli heccinavaru idannu aritilla
